text: Zig may refer to: *Ziz or Zig, a giant griffin-like bird in Jewish mythology *Zığ, Baku, Azerbaijan *Zig, Iran, a village in Razavi Khorasan Province, Iran *Zig (programming language), a general-purpose programming language designed for robustness, optimality, and maintainability *Zoster-immune globulin ==People== *Glenn Danzig, American musician *One half of Australian comedy duo Zig and Zag (Australian performers) *Zig Ziglar, American self-help author and speaker *Pen name of Eliza Archard Conner ==In fiction== *The space ship from the video game Zero Wing *One half of the puppet comedy duo Zig and Zag (puppets) *One of the main characters from the French comic strip Zig et Puce *Zigs (film), a 2001 gambling film directed by Mars Callahan ==See also== *Zigzag (disambiguation)
title: Zig
